item.title: The X Layer testnet is now officially live, with OKB serving as the native Gas token.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to official channels, the X Layer testnet has officially commenced. OKB serves as the native Gas token. Users can obtain testnet tokens through the faucet and achieve seamless cross-chain operations on Sepolia.

item.title: MEXC Exchange Coin MX has surged by 17.8% in the last 24 hours, currently trading at $3.13.
item.description: On August 22nd, based on market data, the price of the native exchange token MX of the crypto trading platform MEXC has witnessed a surge of 17.8% within the past 24 hours and reached $3.13. At present, its total market capitalization has reached $285 million.

item.title: Security Alert: Please upgrade iOS, iPadOS, and macOS to the latest version as soon as possible to prevent vulnerability attacks
item.description: On August 22nd, Apple released a security update on August 20, 2025. This update addresses the CVE-2025-43300 vulnerability that affects iOS, iPadOS, and macOS systems. CVE-2025-43300 is a buffer overflow vulnerability discovered in Apple's ImageIO framework. An attacker could take advantage of this vulnerability by tampering with a malicious image file, leading to memory corruption and potentially enabling the execution of remote code. Apple has resolved this issue by strengthening boundary checks. It has been reported that this vulnerability has been exploited in highly sophisticated attacks aimed at specific victims.BlockBeats strongly advises all Apple users to update their devices in a timely manner to reduce potential risks. Keeping devices updated is a crucial measure to prevent cyber attacks and protect personal information security.

item.title: ANAP Holdings increased its holdings by 6.26 BTC, bringing the total holdings to 1,006.31 BTC.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to NLNico's monitoring, the Japanese fashion brand ANAP Holdings purchased 6.26 BTC. Currently, the total holdings amount to 1,006.31 BTC.

item.title: Binance Alpha New Airdrop XPIN Threshold: Minimum 200 Points
item.description: On August 22nd, Binance Alpha will serve as the first platform to list the XPIN Network (XPIN), and Alpha trading will officially kick off on August 22, 2025, at 09:00 (UTC). After the trading begins, users who hold at least 200 Binance Alpha Points can obtain 80,000 XPIN airdrop rewards on a first-come, first-served basis. In case the reward pool is not fully claimed, the points threshold will automatically decrease by 15 points every hour. It is important to note that claiming the airdrop will consume 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the airdrop.

item.title: Recently, several Bitcoin ancient whales have significantly increased their ETH holdings, with one address holding as much as 83,000 BTC.
item.description: On August 22nd, as monitored by lookonchain, a Bitcoin ancient whale received 100,784 BTC seven years ago (valued at $642 million), and recently it ended its dormancy. It sold BTC and simultaneously bought 62,914 ETH spot (worth $267 million) at the same time, and opened a long position of up to 135,265 ETH (worth $577 million).Meanwhile, lookonchain just discovered another Bitcoin ancient whale that also deposited BTC into Hyperliquid to sell and buy ETH. On-chain tracking shows that this veteran player received 85,947 BTC seven years ago (worth $547 million), and it is likely that the two are the same entity.Currently, it has been confirmed that their six wallets still hold 83,585 BTC (worth $9.42 billion).

item.title: If Ethereum breaks $4400, the mainstream CEX cumulative short liquidation volume will reach $1.703 billion
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, if Ethereum manages to break through $4400, the total short liquidation strength on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.703 billion.Conversely, if Ethereum drops below $4100, the total long liquidation strength on mainstream CEXs will reach $2.001 billion.BlockBeats Note: The liquidation chart does not provide the exact number of contracts to be liquidated or the exact value of contracts to be liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the relative significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, strength.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows the extent to which the asset price reaching a certain level will be impacted. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that when the price reaches that level, there will be a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Cryptocurrency Fear and Greed Index currently stands at 50, indicating a neutral market sentiment.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Alternative Data, the current Crypto Fear and Greed Index for today is 50 (it was 50 yesterday), with a weekly average of 60. Market sentiment remains neutral.Note: The Fear Index ranges from 0 to 100 and incorporates the following indicators: Volatility (25%) + Market Volume (25%) + Social Media Hype (15%) + Market Surveys (15%) + Bitcoin's Dominance (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).

item.title: Upbit Trading Volume Continues to Shrink: XRP, ETH, API3 Currently in Top Three
item.description: On August 22nd, based on CoinGecko data, in the past 24 hours, Upbit's trading volume declined to $1.708 billion, experiencing a decrease of 31.1%. Among them, the XRP/KRW trading pair accounted for 14.64% of the volume and ranked first in the Korean won market. The rest of the top five were: ETH, API3, BTC, and SOL.

item.title: Ethereum Deposit Trend Eases, with CEX Inflow Narrowed to 46,000 ETH in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 22nd, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, the total net inflow of ETH on CEX was 46,000 ETH. The top three CEXs in terms of inflow volume are as follows:· Binance, with an inflow of 67,900 ETH;· Kraken, with an inflow of 7,142.29 ETH;· Coinbase Pro, with an inflow of 3,131.98 ETH.In addition, Bitfinex witnessed an outflow of 17,100 ETH and ranked first in the outflow list.
